Kimileri tasarÄ±mÄ±n dÄ±ÅŸ gÃ¶rÃ¼nÃ¼ÅŸle ilgili olduÄŸunu dÃ¼ÅŸÃ¼nÃ¼r. Ancak biraz eÅŸelerseniz, iÅŸlevle ilgili olduÄŸunu gÃ¶rÃ¼rsÃ¼nÃ¼z. Bir ÅŸeyi gerÃ§ekten derinlemesine anlamak, Ã¼zerine kafa yormak, Ã¼stÃ¼n kÃ¶rÃ¼ geÃ§iÅŸtirmemek, tutkulu bir adanma gerektirir. Ä°lk gÃ¶rÃ¼ÅŸme Ã§ok iyi geÃ§tiÄŸi iÃ§in sonraki haftalar haftada bir saat olmak Ã¼zere buluÅŸup tasarÄ±m ve frontend konularÄ±nda beyin fÄ±rtÄ±nasÄ± yaptÄ±k. --- ## Rauch'un Ã¶nerisi HaftalÄ±k yaptÄ±ÄŸÄ±mÄ±z toplantÄ±larÄ±n birinde _-konu nasÄ±l aÃ§Ä±ldÄ± hatÄ±rlamÄ±yorum-_ beni ona Ã¶neren kiÅŸinin [Rauch](https://twitter.com/rauchg) olduÄŸunu Ã¶ÄŸrendim. `,(0,r.jsxDEV)(u,{caption:"Steve Jobs",cite:"Wired, \u015Eubat 1996",children:(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:`Tasar\u0131m tuhaf bir s\xF6zc\xFCkt\xFCr. Kimileri tasar\u0131m\u0131n d\u0131\u015F g\xF6r\xFCn\xFC\u015Fle ilgili oldu\u011Funu
d\xFC\u015F\xFCn\xFCr. Ancak biraz e\u015Felerseniz, i\u015Flevle ilgili oldu\u011Funu g\xF6r\xFCrs\xFCn\xFCz. Mac'\u0131n
tasar\u0131m\u0131 onun bir par\xE7as\u0131 olsa da d\u0131\u015F g\xF6r\xFCn\xFCmden ibaret de\u011Fildi. \xD6ncelikle
nas\u0131l i\u015Fledi\u011Fiyle ilgiliydi. Bir \u015Feyi ger\xE7ekten iyi tasarlamak i\xE7in onu
kavraman\u0131z gerek, iyice \xF6z\xFCmsemeniz gerek. Bir \u015Feyi ger\xE7ekten derinlemesine
anlamak, \xFCzerine kafa yormak, \xFCst\xFCn k\xF6r\xFC ge\xE7i\u015Ftirmemek, tutkulu bir adanma
gerektirir. \xC7o\u011Fu insan ise buna zaman ay\u0131rmaz.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/mdenesfe/Documents/Planor/blogs/post/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-b921b930-2a08-4007-8931-72856e95e36c.mdx",lineNumber:18,columnNumber:3},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/mdenesfe/Documents/Planor/blogs/post/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-b921b930-2a08-4007-8931-72856e95e36c.mdx",lineNumber:17,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:`\u0130lk g\xF6r\xFC\u015Fmemiz tasar\u0131m ve vizyon odakl\u0131yd\u0131.

`,(0,r.jsxDEV)("section",{hidden:!0,children:[(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:`Bu arada Enes ile tan\u0131\u015Fmadan hemen \xF6nce,
Rauch bana mesaj yazm\u0131\u015F ve g\xF6r\xFC\u015Fme talebinde bulunmu\u015Ftu.
O s\u0131ralar Vercel konferans d\xFCzenledi\u011Fi i\xE7in herkese att\u0131\u011F\u0131 otomatik mesaj
sanm\u0131\u015Ft\u0131m ve d\xF6n\xFC\u015F yapmam\u0131\u015Ft\u0131m \u{1F92F}`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/mdenesfe/Documents/Planor/blogs/post/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-b921b930-2a08-4007-8931-72856e95e36c.mdx",lineNumber:65,columnNumber:3},this),(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:`Daha sonradan \xF6\u011Freniyorum ki
yat\u0131r\u0131mc\u0131s\u0131 oldu\u011Fu Upstash'\u0131 anlat\u0131p beni Enes ile tan\u0131\u015Ft\u0131rmak maksatl\u0131ym\u0131\u015F.
Sa\u011Fl\u0131k olsun, zaten konu\u015Facak kadar ingilizcem yoktu \u{1F972}`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/mdenesfe/Documents/Planor/blogs/post/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-b921b930-2a08-4007-8931-72856e95e36c.mdx",lineNumber:70,columnNumber:1},this)]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"/Users/mdenesfe/Documents/Planor/blogs/post/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-b921b930-2a08-4007-8931-72856e95e36c.mdx",lineNumber:64,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.blockquote,{children:[`
`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:`Tam da burada kafan\u0131zda deli sorular;

SF merkezli bir \u015Firkette \xE7al\u0131\u015Fabiliyorsun?
\u015Eirket hen\xFCz yeni kurulmu\u015Ftu ve \xE7al\u0131\u015Fanlar\u0131n hepsi t\xFCrkt\xFC \u{1F607}
Tabi bu kadar basit de\u011Fil.
Ba\u015Fka bir yaz\u0131da konu\u015Furuz, k\u0131saca sen i\u015Fini iyi yap.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/mdenesfe/Documents/Planor/blogs/post/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-b921b930-2a08-4007-8931-72856e95e36c.mdx",lineNumber:76,columnNumber:3},this),`

`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:`Tasar\u0131m ve vizyon konulu toplant\u0131lar 2-3 hafta devam etti.

`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:`\u015Eirkete ba\u015Ftan a\u015Fa\u011F\u0131ya yenilenmi\u015F,

console (dashboard) ve sosyal platformdaki tasar\u0131mlar plan dahilindeydi.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/mdenesfe/Documents/Planor/blogs/post/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-b921b930-2a08-4007-8931-72856e95e36c.mdx",lineNumber:90,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:`Logo konusunda paradan ka\xE7madan
\xE7ok iyi i\u015Flere imza atm\u0131\u015F bir tasar\u0131mc\u0131 ile anla\u015Ft\u0131k.
\u0130lk a\u015Famada bize 4 farkl\u0131 logo sundu ama hi\xE7 biri bizi anlatm\u0131yor
ve estetik durmuyordu.
Tekrar \xE7al\u0131\u015Ft\u0131 ama yeni logolar\u0131 da be\u011Fenmedik.
S\xFCre\xE7 bizi mutlu etmemi\u015Fti,
san\u0131r\u0131m kendisi de mutlu de\u011Fildi ki sundu\u011Fu i\u015Fler daha \xF6nce yapt\u0131\u011F\u0131 i\u015Flerin
yan\u0131na bile yakla\u015Famayacak vasatl\u0131ktayd\u0131.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/mdenesfe/Documents/Planor/blogs/post/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-b921b930-2a08-4007-8931-72856e95e36c.mdx",lineNumber:105,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:`Saatlik \xE7al\u0131\u015Ft\u0131\u011F\u0131m s\xFCre boyunca \xE7ift tarafl\u0131 bir memnuniyet hakimdi.
Enes Amerika'da ya\u015F\u0131yor ben ise T\xFCrkiye'de.
Bu s\xFCre\xE7te birbirimizi yak\u0131ndan tan\u0131m\u0131\u015F olduk.
Zaten d\xFCnyan\u0131n di\u011Fer ucundaki bir insan\u0131
beraber i\u015F yapmaktan daha iyi nas\u0131l tan\u0131yabilirsin ki.
\u015Eartlar el veri\u015Fli bir hal alm\u0131\u015Ft\u0131 ve haftan\u0131n \xFC\xE7 g\xFCn\xFC \xE7al\u0131\u015Fmaya ba\u015Flad\u0131m.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/mdenesfe/Documents/Planor/blogs/post/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-b921b930-2a08-4007-8931-72856e95e36c.mdx",lineNumber:212,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:`G\xF6rev tan\u0131m\u0131m tasar\u0131msal her \u015Feyi kaps\u0131yordu.
Zaten ba\u015F\u0131ndan beri yapt\u0131\u011F\u0131m i\u015Flere devam edecektim.
Tasar\u0131msal derken sadece tasar\u0131m yap\u0131p b\u0131rakmak de\u011Fil,
frontend taraf\u0131ndaki i\u015Fler de tasar\u0131m ba\u015Fl\u0131\u011F\u0131 alt\u0131ndayd\u0131.
Zira ekipteki herkes software engineer'd\u0131
ve UI (User Interface) taraf\u0131ndaki i\u015Flerle u\u011Fra\u015Fmak z\xFCl geliyordu.
Benim ekibe kat\u0131lmamla frontend i\u015Flerinin t\xFCm\xFCn\xFC alm\u0131\u015Ft\u0131m.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/mdenesfe/Documents/Planor/blogs/post/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-b921b930-2a08-4007-8931-72856e95e36c.mdx",lineNumber:219,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:`Bundan daha do\u011Fal ve mant\u0131kl\u0131 ne olabilir ki?

`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:`\u015Eirket para kazanana kadar yazd\u0131\u011F\u0131n inan\u0131lmaz kodun
ve yapt\u0131\u011F\u0131n s\xFCper \xF6tesi tasar\u0131m\u0131n pek bir olay\u0131 yok.
Bu demek de\u011Fildir ki bas ge\xE7.
M\xFCkemmelliyet\xE7ilik hastal\u0131\u011F\u0131na kap\u0131l\u0131p zaman kaybetmekten bahsediyorum.
\u015E\xF6yle d\xFC\u015F\xFCn, sence harika olan bir fikre alt\u0131 ay emek verdin
ve s\xFCper tasar\u0131mlar yapt\u0131n ama \xFCr\xFCn\xFC kimse kullanmad\u0131?`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/mdenesfe/Documents/Planor/blogs/post/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-b921b930-2a08-4007-8931-72856e95e36c.mdx",lineNumber:239,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:`Hali haz\u0131rda \xE7al\u0131\u015Fan uygulama Angular ile yaz\u0131lm\u0131\u015Ft\u0131,
daha \xF6nce Vue ve React kullanarak \xE7ok fazla uygulama yapm\u0131\u015Ft\u0131m
ama hi\xE7 Angular yazmam\u0131\u015Ft\u0131m.
Console bundan sonra benim sorumlulu\u011Fumdaysa
rahat hareket edece\u011Fim bir hale \xE7evirmeliydim.
Mant\u0131kl\u0131 ve h\u0131zl\u0131 bir yol haritas\u0131 laz\u0131md\u0131.
Console 4-5 sayfadan olu\u015Fuyordu,
React (Nextjs) ile h\u0131zl\u0131ca klonlamaya karar verdim.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/mdenesfe/Documents/Planor/blogs/post/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-b921b930-2a08-4007-8931-72856e95e36c.mdx",lineNumber:246,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:`Kullan\u0131c\u0131lar art\u0131yor, yeni \xF6zellikler geliyor,
JavaScript SDK yaz\u0131lmas\u0131 gerekiyor,
ba\u015Far\u0131l\u0131 olan redis'in yan\u0131na kafka da ekleniyor derken
i\u015Fler h\u0131zla b\xFCy\xFCmeye devam ediyor.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/mdenesfe/Documents/Planor/blogs/post/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-b921b930-2a08-4007-8931-72856e95e36c.mdx",lineNumber:332,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:`Yat\u0131r\u0131m alm\u0131\u015F giri\u015Fimler h\u0131zl\u0131 aksiyon al\u0131r ve s\xFCrekli bir \u015Feyler de\u011Fi\u015Fir.
Bu de\u011Fi\u015Fimler olurken freelance veya yar\u0131 zamanl\u0131 \xE7al\u0131\u015Fmak pek i\u015Flerine gelmez.
\xC7al\u0131\u015Fanlar\u0131n tam zamanl\u0131 olmas\u0131 ve \xFCr\xFCne tam odaklanmas\u0131 \xF6nemlidir.
\xD6yle de oldu, tam zamanl\u0131 \xE7al\u0131\u015Fmaya ba\u015Flad\u0131m.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/mdenesfe/Documents/Planor/blogs/post/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-b921b930-2a08-4007-8931-72856e95e36c.mdx",lineNumber:337,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(u,{caption:"Steve Jobs",cite:"Smithsonian Institution Oral and Video Histories, 20 Nisan 1995",children:(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:`Bizim sekt\xF6rde art\u0131k kimse tek ba\u015F\u0131na bir \u015Fey yapam\u0131yor. Etraf\u0131n\u0131zda bir ekip
olu\u015Fturuyorsunuz. O ekibin \xE7al\u0131\u015Fma b\xFCt\xFCnl\xFC\u011F\xFCnden sorumlusunuz. Herkes, \xFCzerine
d\xFC\u015Fenin en iyisini yapmaya u\u011Fra\u015F\u0131yor.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/mdenesfe/Documents/Planor/blogs/post/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-b921b930-2a08-4007-8931-72856e95e36c.mdx",lineNumber:346,columnNumber:3},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/mdenesfe/Documents/Planor/blogs/post/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-b921b930-2a08-4007-8931-72856e95e36c.mdx",lineNumber:342,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:`\u0130\u015F planlamas\u0131 hakk\u0131nda \u015Fu detay\u0131 da vermeden ge\xE7mek istemem;
Enes ile haftada bir toplant\u0131 yapar ve i\u015Flerin \xF6ncelik s\u0131ras\u0131n\u0131 belirleriz.
Geri kalan ileti\u015Fim Slack \xFCzerinden devam eder.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/mdenesfe/Documents/Planor/blogs/post/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-b921b930-2a08-4007-8931-72856e95e36c.mdx",lineNumber:351,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:`Daha \xF6nce de belirtti\u011Fim gibi, geli\u015Ftiricilere y\xF6nelik i\u015F yap\u0131yorsan\u0131z
DX konusu kritik \xF6neme sahiptir.
Yani; kullan\u0131\u015Fl\u0131 bir dashboard, detayl\u0131 bir dok\xFCman, d\xFCzg\xFCn \xE7al\u0131\u015Fan bir CLI
ve pop\xFCler diller i\xE7in SDK.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/mdenesfe/Documents/Planor/blogs/post/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-b921b930-2a08-4007-8931-72856e95e36c.mdx",lineNumber:359,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:`Di\u011Fer konu ise; \xF6rnek projeler, g\xFCncel blog yaz\u0131lar\u0131 ve twitter'daki etkile\u015Fim.
Bunlar\u0131n hepsini gayet iyi yap\u0131yorduk ama \xE7\u0131tay\u0131 bir t\u0131k \xFCste \xE7\u0131kartmak istiyorduk.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/mdenesfe/Documents/Planor/blogs/post/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-b921b930-2a08-4007-8931-72856e95e36c.mdx",lineNumber:364,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:`Sekt\xF6rde i\u015Fini bilen uzman insanlara blog yaz\u0131lar\u0131 yazd\u0131r\u0131yoruz ama
blog yaz\u0131lar\u0131m\u0131z iyi olmas\u0131na ra\u011Fmen gerekli de\u011Feri g\xF6rm\xFCyordu.
Docusaurus'un varsay\u0131lan temas\u0131n\u0131 kullan\u0131yorduk,
ba\u015Fta i\u015Fimizi g\xF6rm\xFC\u015Ft\xFC ama \u015Fu an yetersiz kal\u0131yordu.
Bu i\xE7eri\u011Fi daha g\xFCzel bir tasar\u0131mla vitrine koymal\u0131yd\u0131k.
Benim de tam zamanl\u0131 ba\u015Flamam\u0131 f\u0131rsat bilerek i\u015F listemize ald\u0131k.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/mdenesfe/Documents/Planor/blogs/post/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-b921b930-2a08-4007-8931-72856e95e36c.mdx",lineNumber:367,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:[`Blog yaz\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n hepsi markdown olarak yaz\u0131lm\u0131\u015Ft\u0131
ve mevcut d\xFCzeni bozmadan yeni blog'u tasarlamam gerekiyordu.
Biraz ara\u015Ft\u0131rd\u0131ktan sonra `,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.a,{href:"https://www.contentlayer.dev/",children:"Contentlayer"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/mdenesfe/Documents/Planor/blogs/post/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-b921b930-2a08-4007-8931-72856e95e36c.mdx",lineNumber:376,columnNumber:27},this),`
denen harika i\xE7erik y\xF6neticisine denk geldim.
Nextjs ile olan harika uyumu i\u015Flerimi inan\u0131lmaz basitle\u015Ftirmi\u015Fti
ve sadece tasar\u0131ma odakland\u0131m.
\xC7ok k\u0131sa s\xFCrede yay\u0131na ald\u0131k \u{1F389}`]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"/Users/mdenesfe/Documents/Planor/blogs/post/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-b921b930-2a08-4007-8931-72856e95e36c.mdx",lineNumber:374,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:`Bu projeleri yaparken i\xE7ime sinmeyen hi\xE7 bir \u015Fey yapmad\u0131m,
